message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $130 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that 130 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do 115 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $115 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really serious about getting this product, but my absolute maximum is $105. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy.

I understand that 105 is your absolute maximum, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I can do 110 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit outside my budget.  If you're willing to come down to $108, I'm ready to buy right now.  Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as 108. I can do 112 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
